column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We started off with the pinxtos
column2: which are little bite size appetizers. My favorite was the goat cheese croquette. It was intoxicating. I think I could go here and those for my entire meal. We also had the scallops
column4: the bacon wrapped dates and the dessert pinxtos. Everything was so good
column5: and the service was great. I would definitely suggest trying as much as you can
column6: but you must get the goat cheese croquettes.
